N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7354.9 - Environmental health and safety inspections

State Regulations
(a) The director shall designate one or more
staff members to conduct regular environmental health and safety inspections of
all areas of the facility to determine whether an environmental hazard exists, and shall take the necessary action to correct any such hazard. (b) Such inspections shall be conducted at
least once every week, and the results of such inspections shall be recorded in
a facility log maintained for such purpose. Notes
